thread.section_title: HandmadePiece Art 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 HandmadePiece Art 的点评意见 | www.handmadepiece.com
thread.title: Thomas Shannon
thread.title_full: HandmadePiece Art 的点评人 Thomas Shannon

author: Thomas Shannon
title: Thomas Shannon
text: I was totally blown away with the quality of the painting and the skill of the artist.The painting has life about it. They have produced for me a framed item which will become in due time a family heirloom, I have no hesitation in recommending HandmadePiece Art and will be using them again.
